column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Alexandra - Thanks for your review. Can you tell me why your service was bad at the bar? As you might imagine
column2: we get lots of complaints about our extended wait times. But like the late
column3: great Yogi Berra once said: "No one goes to that restaurant anymore. It's too crowded." We will be opening more locations in the coming months
column4: which we hope will alleviate some of the crowds. In the meantime
column5: we thank you for your understanding.
